name: Sacrifice to the Harvest God
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 52

Farm crops to feed your villagers, but to ensure a good harvest, sacrifices must be made. Sacrifice crops and villagers to increase your favor with the Harvest God. Don't let your villagers starve.

Instructions:

Click the left and right side of the screen to move the camera. Click on crops to harvest/plant them. Click on a villager to send them to be sacrificed. You can only sacrifice one villager at a time. Click on the temple to enter it. You can use the buttons to offer crops or exit and complete the sacrifice.

Made in Unity.

Graphics by me and my sister (thank you so so much)

Audio by: there is no audio I ran out of time

Font: Pixeloid https://www.fontspace.com/pixeloid-font-f69232

Everything else: me
